import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LoanService } from 'src/app/Services/loan.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-view-loan', templateUrl: './view-loan.component.html', styleUrls: ['./view-loan.component.css'] }) export class ViewLoanComponent implements OnInit { loans: any; currentLoan = null; currentIndex = -1; idNumber =''; constructor( private loanService: LoanService){} ngOnInit() : void { this.retrieveLoan(); } retrieveLoan() : void { this.loanService.findPendingLoans() .subscribe( data => { this.loans = data; console.log(data); }, error => { console.log(error); }); } setActiveLoan(loan: null, index: number){ this,this.currentLoan = loan this.currentIndex = index; } searchByID(): void{ this.loanService.findByIDNumber(this.idNumber) .subscribe( data => { this.loans = data; console.log(data); }, error => { console.log(error); }); } }
